response.overview: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and identifies more with the mafia life at the expense of his regular one.
response.tagline: In 1978, the US government waged a war against organized crime. One man was left behind the lines.
response.title: Donnie Brasco

cast.character: Prison Guard for Pacino and Depp (uncredited)
